text: In mathematics, Ferrers functions are certain special functions defined in terms of hypergeometric functions. They are named after Norman Macleod Ferrers. == Definitions == ;Ferrers function of the first kind : P_v^\mu(x) = \left(\frac{1+x}{1-x}\right)^{\mu/2}\cdot\frac{F(v+1,-v;1-\mu;1/2-x/2)}{\Gamma(1-\mu)} ;Ferrers function of the second kind : Q_v^\mu(x)= \cos(\mu\pi)\left(\frac{1+x}{1-x}\right)^{\mu/2}\frac{F(v+1,-v;1-\mu;1/2-2/x)} {\Gamma(1-\mu ) } == See also == * Legendre function ==References== Category:Special functions
title: Ferrers function
